Let's write the entire Fortran program. Note: We are reading from standard input. We write to standard output only at the end. We assume the input integers are within the range of default integers. Code:

    program combined
        implicit none
        integer :: n, k, a, l, c, X, Y, i, quotient, remainder
        character(len=50) :: temp, s
        integer :: freq(0:255), distinct, ascii, len_s
        logical :: allTwice

        ! Step 1: read n and k
        read(*,*) n, k

        ! Initialize for the first program
        l = 0
        c = 1

        ! Read the n integers do i = 1, n
            read(*,*) a
            if (a == l) then
                c = c + 1
            else
                c = 1
            end if
            l = a
        end do

        ! Compute X
        if (c + k > n) then
            X = n - c
        else
            X = -1
        end if

        ! Step 2: Compute Y from X (second program) quotient = X / 3
        remainder = mod(X, 3) if (remainder == 0) then
            Y = 2 * quotient
        else
            Y = 2 * quotient + 1
        end if

        ! Step 3: Convert Y to a string
        write(temp, *) Y
        s = trim(adjustl(temp))

        ! Step 4: Process the string s (third program)
        ! Initialize frequency array
        freq = 0

        len_s = len_trim(s) do i = 1, len_s
            ascii = iachar(s(i:i))
            freq(ascii) = freq(ascii) + 1
        end do

        distinct = 0

        character(len=50) :: temp, s

        logical :: allTwice

        else

                if (freq(i) /= 2) then

        end do

            import java.util.*;

            public class codeforces_222_A {
                public static void main(String[] args) {
                    Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
                    int n = in.nextInt(), k = in.nextInt(), l = 0, c = 1;
                    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                        int a = in.nextInt();
                        if (a == l) c += 1;
                        else c = 1;
                        l = a;
                    }
                    if (c + k > n) System.out.println(n - c);
                    else System.out.println(-1);
                }
            }

    The program:

        program combined
            implicit none
            integer :: n, k, a, l, c, X, Y, i, quotient, remainder
            character(len=50) :: temp, s
            integer :: freq(0:255), distinct, ascii, len_s
            logical :: allTwice

            ! Read n and k
            read(*,*) n, k

            ! Initialize l and c
            l = 0
            c = 1

            ! Read the n integers
            do i = 1, n
                read(*,*) a
                if (a == l) then
                    c = c + 1
                else
                    c = 1
                end if
                l = a
            end do

            ! Compute X
            if (c + k > n) then
                X = n - c
            else
                X = -1
            end if

            ! Second program: compute Y from X
            quotient = X / 3
            remainder = mod(X, 3)
            if (remainder == 0) then
                Y = 2 * quotient
            else
                Y = 2 * quotient + 1
            end if

            ! Convert Y to a string
            write(temp, *) Y
            s = trim(adjustl(temp))

            ! Third program: process string s
            freq = 0   ! array assignment

            len_s = len_trim(s)
            do i = 1, len_s
                ascii = iachar(s(i:i))
                ! Only consider ASCII in 0 to 255
                if (ascii >= 0 .and. ascii <= 255) then
                    freq(ascii) = freq(ascii) + 1
                else
                    ! If outside, ignore? but the string is from an integer -> should be in 0-255
                end if
            end do

            distinct = 0
            allTwice = .true.
            do i = 0, 255
                if (freq(i) > 0) then
                    distinct = distinct + 1
                    if (freq(i) /= 2) then
                        allTwice = .false.
                    end if
                end if
            end do

            ! Output
            if (distinct == 2 .and. allTwice) then
                write(*,*) "Yes"
            else
                write(*,*) "No"
            end if
        end program combined
